price: E teu povo desmentiu-o enquanto ele é a Verdade. Dize: "Não sou, sobre vós, patrono.
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
